bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: The District Court of the United States, Western District of Washington, Northern Division

div1.p: United States District Court Western District of Washington
Northern Division
Return to Writ of Habeas Corpus
In the Matter of the Application of Tsunetaro Machida for a Writ of Habeas Corpus
To the Honorable JEREMIAH NETERER, Judge of the District Court of the United States for the Western District of Washington:

Now comes the respondent, HENRY M. WHITE, United States Commissioner of Immigration for the District of Washington, appearing by T. W. Lynch, Acting Commissioner of Immigration, and produces the body of TSUNETARO MACHIDA in obedience to the command and direction of the order to show cause in the above entitled matter, being the person named in the petition for said writ.

For answer and return to said writ, respondent avers that he detained in his custody the body of TSUNETARO MACHIDA for deportation from the United States as an alien Japanese person not entitled to remain in the United States under and by virtue of an order of the Secretary of Labor issued to him the said respondent.

To be attached hereto are the records, decisions and exhibits, both on the hearing before him as Commissioner of Immigration and the hearing in appeal to the Secretary of Labor, now attached to the return to the order to show cause and in the custody of the Court, which constitute a part of this return.
And now the respondent having fully answered, he prays that said writ may be discharged.
HENRY M. WHITE, United States Commissioner of Immigration appearing by T W Lynch
Acting Commissioner of Immigration.
United States of America
Northern Division of Western District of Washington
ss.

T. W. Lynch, being first duly sworn, on his oath deposes and says: That he is Acting Commissioner of Immigration named in the foregoing return; that he has read the said return and knows the contents thereof, and that he believes the same to be true.
T W Lynch
SUBSCRIBED and sworn to before me this 26th day of September, 1921.
S.E. Leitch
Deputy Clerk U.S. District Court, Western Districtof Washington.
In the District Court of the United States for the Western District of Washington
Northern Division.
In the Matter of the Application of Tsunetaro Machida for Writ of Habeas Corpus
Return to Writ of Habeas Corpus.
Filed in the United States District Court
Western District of Washingotn
Northern Division
Tx
F.M. Harshberger, Clerk
By S.E. Leitch Deputy
